name: Hell Breaker
description:
Story
In my quest to become a powerful Wizard
I found an ancient book of powerful Magic.
But the knowledge was forbidden,
and in exchange for its secrets, the Book banished me to Hell.
Now, in order to escape,
I must kill the Gatekeeper and his army to open the gates of Hell.
I must hurry, before my soul is bound to this place, and I am trapped in Hell forever…




Features

* Optimized for the bHaptics haptic suit.

This game is optimized for the bHaptics TactSuit, delivering feedback from enemy hits,
as well as feedback when casting spells to create an immersive experience!
Find out more at Our site

* Escape from Hell!

Time is limited. Exploit each monster’s weakness to quickly work your way
through Hell before facing the Gatekeeper!
- You only have 15 minutes to escape before you are bound to Hell forever.
Use your time wisely.
- Each monster has their own elemental weakness.
Cycle through your skills to quickly vanquish them
- Includes local leader board to keep track of your times as a score!

* Three different magic spells (fire/ice/electric)

Harness the elemental powers of fire, ice and electricity!
Each monster you face has an elemental weakness.
Hit them with the right spell to dispatch them quickly!






- HARDWARE SUPPORT-
• Compatible with bHaptics Tactsuit, full body haptic suit for VR
